information: The company ERGSON GMBH, is a Manufacturer/ Producer, founded in 1998, which operates in the Cereals and grains industry. It also operates in the Feeds for animal farming, Electric and electronic components - machines for manufacturing, Monitoring and control equipment, and Electronic data processing - software industries. It is based in Ammersbek, Germany.
